[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” css_animation=”none” kd_bottom_separator_style=”rounded-down” kd_bottom_separator_height=”separator-height-medium” kd_bottom_separator=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1604034574794{padding-top: 245px !important;padding-bottom: 350px !important;background: #000000 url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/SON_7711_edited-min1_ef7234d62c8ce495871a9ba9ff7dfeb9.jpg?id=8543) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” kd_bottom_separator_bg=”#fef7f6″][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”Welcome to Archi Events” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:65|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Great%20Vibes%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”]Plan my Event[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_empty_space height=”120px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1552576490115{padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1552574170051{margin-top: -170px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

Quality in Work

Working on Exact Standard and Timely Delivery

Reliable Services

We treat every event as our own and put our heart and soul into it

Zero Error Work

Data and planning backed up by documentation

Perfect Planning

Putting our sweat and blood to make that happen

Personal Supervision

Giving Attention to details at every stage

Reasonable Prices

Pricing according to budget and specifications of Clients

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1601975986387{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/260164.jpg?id=7780) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text=”Event Management Company in Jaipur” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:60|text_align:center|color:%23000000″ google_fonts=”font_family:Great%20Vibes%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

Archi Events is the best event management company in Jaipur, Rajasthan with an aim to produce the most creative events that are ever witnessed. We are the most trusted event Planners and we have successfully organized 500+ events which include Weddings, Corporate Events, Social Events, Political Management etc. Our forte lies in giving exceptional attention and intricate details to give quality events within the budget guidelines. We believe in giving personal attention to events at every stage so that you can be sure that we will treat your wedding like ours while you just relax and enjoy the celebrations with near and dear ones. Our concept since the inception is that “Your Event- Your Budget- Your Dream = We Make the special moment come true”. This makes us the most trusted and innovative event management company in Jaipur.

[/vc_column_text]READ MORE[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_gallery type=”nivo” interval=”5″ images=”8559,8545,8546,8553,8547,8549,8548,8554,8551,8552″ img_size=”full” css_animation=”fadeInRight”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” kd_fixed_background=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1603209708957{padding-bottom: 130px !important;background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/abstract-gold-bokeh-background-light-effect_29865-_7de1314804d887d55bc386950776dfcb.jpg?id=8570) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1556031502392{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Services we offer to make every event worth memories” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:60|text_align:center” google_fonts=”font_family:Great%20Vibes%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeIn”]

Opportunities don't happen. We create them
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1552576987690{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Wedding Event

We ensure that your weddings are implemented with definite flawlessness

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Corporate Event

A perfect Corporate occasion helps to strengthen the business network and relationship with clients.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Social Event

Experience personalised services for social parties with our bundle of unique Ideas and creativity

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Political Event

Get best services for Election Management for all categories of elections.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Sangeet Celebration

Hire the experts who have a range of themes, artists and decor to make that dream sangeet memorable

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
Mehandi Ceremony

Celebrate that unique and dream mehandi with us

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Marriage Anniversary

Hire us and relieve those beautiful wedding moment again as Anniversary

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Birthday Celebration

A range of packages where we offer multiple party ideas, games, Decor and Personal supervision

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Retirement Party

Celebrate all of the life's hard work, efforts and make it memorable with a prefect blend

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Hospitality, Logistics & Security Arrangements

Hire Us and get rid of the arrangements tensions and enjoy that VIP feeling

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Photography

Perfect locations and some portrait clicks define the best photography and preserve the most beautiful emotions

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Catering

Our team offers a perfect blend from mesmerizing outdoor catering, lip-smacking snacks to amazing sweets

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Inauguration Ceremony

Who doesn't need that perfect event for your dream inaugurations?
Trust Archi Events for the same

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” kd_fixed_background=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1604567351123{background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/fb69bf9f09bbf0aa79d2c3fdd3d8459a.jpg?id=7753) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Process” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:60|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Great%20Vibes%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]
  • 1
    Initial Meeting and Brief Discussion

  • 2
    Venue Visit and Discussion on Requirement

  • 3
    Budget Estimation and creation of Master Plan

  • 4
    Discussion and Improvements in Master Plan

  • 5
    Confirmation and Execution of Discussed Services

!important;background-size: cover !important;}”]

Thinking about why to choose Archi Events right?

Well there are various factors that helps us maintain that standard and dignity of trusted, reliable and best event management company in Jaipur.

To know about us click on this button…

[/vc_column_text]Why Archi Events[vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” kd_image_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.3)” kd_fixed_background=”true” kd_image_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1604246089522{padding-top: 130px !important;background: #1a1a1a url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/5efa06b5e77cd204bf6900e5_1593444021682.jpg?id=8808) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1516029079179{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”Testimonials” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:70|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Great%20Vibes%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1552578818580{padding-bottom: 90px !important;}”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1516029087146{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

Best event management company in jaipur for all your event needs.They monitor and deeply analysis all the requirement and maintain standard throughout execution. I would highly recommend to contact Archi Events for event management.
Happy Client!!
CA R.G Gupta
